description: [``botocore``] Added support for configuring a client certificate and key when establishing TLS connections.
[``botocore``] Update ssm client to latest version

[``botocore``] Fix failure to retry on empty credentials and invalid JSON returned from IMDS `1049 <https://github.com/boto/botocore/issues/1049>`__ `1403 <https://github.com/boto/botocore/issues/1403>`__
